name: textgrad
text:
System:You are a software engineering assistant that categorizes GitHub issues.
Based on the title and description, classify issues into one of the predefined categories.
Be concise and answer with only the classification label.

Title: "{title}"
Description: "{body}"

Classify this issue as exactly one of: "bug", "feature", or "question".

Response: Please provide the title and description of the issue that you want to classify.
